newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Eleven Indonesians die in New Year accidents.
newsitem.headline: Eleven Indonesians die in New Year accidents.

text.p: Eleven Indonesians died and more than 60 were injured in traffic accidents in Jakarta and the nearby hill resort of Bogor during New Year celebrations, the official Antara news agency reported on Thursday.
It quoted hospital sources as saying five people were killed in Jakarta. The others died in traffic accidents in Bogor, 60 km (37 miles) south of the capital.
Antara quoted police in Bogor as saying most of the dead were motorcyclists.
